channel.title: Management on Hi, I'm Huan.
channel.description: Recent content in Management on Hi, I'm Huan.

item.title: It's ok to not know everything
item.description: When you switch to management, and especially when you become a manager of managers, it’s impossible to know about everything that’s going on.

item.title: Slack is my IDE
item.description: You wrote zero lines of code today, and that’s ok.
